page.title: 21Transport in Wimbledon 2011
page.content: Oh what a differnce 25 years makes.The Undergound service now runs every 2-5 mins from Wimbledon,Trams running every 7-12 minutes to Croydon instead of 1 train every 45 minutes.Direct trains to Luton & Bedford.1986 was the year Wimbledon got its first night bus service,the N68 an hourly serice,with one two hour gap.Now we have a 24 hour service on buses 57 & 93,both ruuning half hourly between 1am & 5am,and the N87 running every 10-15 minutes between Aldwych & Kingston.The average frequency of bus sevices was 10 to 20 minutes in 86.Now the 57.93,131 run every 6 mins,the 156,163,164,200,219,every 7-8 mons
